headline: Thermo Fisher Scientific Completes $1B Share Repurchase
summary: WALTHAM, Mass., December 04, 2024--Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc. (NYSE: TMO), the world leader in serving science, today announced that it has completed the repurchase of $1 billion (1.9 million shares) of its common stock. As of December 3, 2024, $3 billion remained available under the company’s share repurchase authorization.
